puzzles.title: The Garden Club
puzzles.scenario: Four friends in a garden club each planted a different flower in a different month this spring. Use the clues to figure out who planted what and when.
clues: Alice planted her flower in March.
The person who planted Roses did so in May.
David planted exactly one month before Carol.

puzzles.title: Movie Night
puzzles.scenario: Four friends each watched a different movie genre on a different day this week. Use the clues to match each person to their genre and day.
clues: Frank watched his movie the day before the person who watched Drama.
Grace watched a movie on Wednesday.
The Comedy was watched on Monday.
Henry did not watch Action or Comedy.
Iris watched her movie the day after Grace.

puzzles.title: The Bake Sale
puzzles.scenario: Five neighbors are preparing for the annual bake sale. Each person baked a different treat and decorated it with a different topping. Use the clues to figure out who baked what with which topping.
clues: The person who baked Pie used Caramel as a topping.
Leo did not use Sprinkles or Frosting.
Maria used Frosting but did not bake Brownies.
Nick baked Muffins with Chocolate Chips.
